dmca.title: Unauthorized Photos in a website you host
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Agencia de Modelos 54once [mailto:agencia@54once.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 07, 2005 11:37 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Unauthorized Photos in a website you host


Dear Mr. Peter Pathos,
Dear Sirs:
 
My name is Manuel Carrasco and I'm the Director from Agencia de Modelos
54once, a models agency located in Peru, South America.
 
In your servers is hosted a website called JOVENCITASPERUVIP.COM. These
people are using copyrighted pictures from our company website without our
authorization. Their business is about illegal prostitution and call girls
as you could read about this in their Contactanos link: "We attend to
executives gentleman, foreigners and businessmen to your home or hotels". As
I read in your User Policy, they are not only doing copyright infringement
with our pictures but also attempting with your own hosting policy.
 
Our business is about real fashion models, and as you can imagine we feel
very upset about this, not only for our well gained name in almost 9 years,
but for our models.
 
I really hope you'll do something to give us a solution to this situation.
 
Best regards,
 
Manuel Carrasco
Director
Agencia de Modelos 54once
Lima - Per
